change.item: Crosswalked to EpiDoc XML from both

div.p: An Ammônios, den Königlichen Schreiber des Hêrakleidês-Bezirks des Arsinoïtês, von Panephremmis, Sohn des Stotoêtis, aus dem Dorf Sok[nopaiû Nês]os im Hêrakleidês-Bezirk. Mein vom Vater geerbter Sklave Panomieus ist gestorben im Monat Phaôphi des gegenwärtigen vierten Jahres des Imperator Caesar Ne[r]va [Traianus] Augustus Ge[r]manicus. [Hiermit bitte ich darum, ihn] in das [Verzeichnis der] Verstorbenen [aufzunehmen]

To Ammon[i]os, royal scribe of the Arsinoite nome, Herakleides division, from Panephremmis, son of Stotoetis, of those of the village of Sok[nopaiou Nes]os, Herakleides division. My slave Panomieus, inherited from my father, died in the month of Phaophi of the present fourth year of Imperator Caesar Ne[r]va [Traianus] Augustus Ge[r]manicus. Therefore I request that he is included in the list] of those, who have died
